#4. Gear
```{r}
#Changing wide to long form for gear

gear<- survey %>% 
  select(8,11:17) %>% 
  gather(gear, use, -country) %>% 
  filter(use==1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=gear, fill=country))+geom_bar()

gear
```
